tips.title: Content Creation Tips
tips.tip1: Provide specific details about your business for the best results
tips.tip2: Specify the goal of your content (e.g., increase sales, brand awareness) in the additional details
tips.tip3: Choose a tone that matches your brand and target audience
tips.tip4: After generating content, always review and customize it to fit your brand perfectly
tips.tip5: Experiment with different options to see what works best for your business

help.title: Frequently Asked Questions
help.question1: Can I edit the generated content?
help.answer1: Yes, you can copy the generated content and edit it in another program, or click the 'Edit' button to edit it in our tool
help.question2: How many content pieces can I generate per month?
help.answer2: The number of content pieces you can generate depends on your subscription plan. The Starter plan includes 50 content pieces per month
help.question3: Can I switch between Thai and English?
help.answer3: Yes, you can choose whether to generate content in Thai or English in the 'Language' option
